I am currently finishing up my PhD under the supervision of Bing Tie and Andrea Barbarulo at Laboratoire de Mécanique Paris-Saclay (Université Paris-Saclay, ENS Paris-Saclay, CentraleSupélec, CNRS).

I am looking for a postdoctoral position in Europe, in the field of computational mechanics, notably model reducation and/or AI (PINN, ML-ROM...).

My research interests are in computational mechanics, more specifically model order reduction, hyperelastic material modelling, and machine learning.
